rules.description: Changes escape key to tilde when used with left_gui or left_control
Changes Pause key to mute mic

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'set inputVolume to input volume of (get volume settings)' -e 'if inputVolume = 0 then' -e '    set inputVolume to 50' -e 'else' -e '    set inputVolume to 0' -e 'end if' -e 'set volume input volume inputVolume'

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Pressing Enter with a modifier sends Ctrl, pressing it by itself sends Enter. Useful for Evil Mode.
Changes spacebar to ctrl when pressed with other keys
